bug.short_desc: [1.8] [compiler] Type Type mismatch: cannot convert from Junk13.ExpressionHelper<Object> to Junk13.ExpressionHelper<Object>

long_desc.thetext:
NOTE: This is a regression. It worked until I updated to the latest from the Eclipse 8 update site.
The cast works around the problem but seems mighty strange. I'm casting the thing to be something that it is already.

Compiles fine on HEAD (3 warnings).
I'll try to find the range where this was broken.

Broken by the fix for bug 429430, published as of tag P20140309-1600
Fixed via bug 429969, published as of tag P20140310-1600.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 429969 ***
I have the latest and it is fixed.

Regression test released here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=7ecdef155e38fd72ad2d98e58818c4164067ef40
Already verified by reporter.
